name: getManagedLinodeSetting
description:
Returns a single Linode's Managed settings.

This command can only be accessed by the unrestricted users of an account.

linodeId.description: The Linode ID whose settings we are accessing.

$block: Settings for a specific Linode related to Managed Services. There is one ManagedLinodeSettings object for each Linode on your Account.

$ul: **group**: The group of the Linode these Settings are for. This is for display purposes only.
**id**: The ID of the Linode these Settings are for.
**label**: The label of the Linode these Settings are for.
**ssh**: The SSH settings for this Linode.
**access**: If true, Linode special forces may access this Linode over ssh to respond to Issues. (default: true)
**ip**: The IP Linode special forces should use to access this Linode (default: any)
**port**: The port Linode special forces should use to access this Linode (default: null)
**user**: The specific user, if any, Linode's special forces should use when accessing this (default: null)
